name: chiropractic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a way of treating diseases that involves pressing a person's joints (= places where two bones are connected): She tried alternative treatments like acupuncture and chiropractic. My neurologist prescribed chiropractic to control pain as part of my treatment. See
chiropractor
More examplesFewer examplesOsteopathy and chiropractic are closely related.Widely available complementary treatments include acupuncture, osteopathy, and chiropractic.He rejects chiropractic as being underpinned by pseudoscience.

relating to or involving treatment that involves pressing a person's joints (= places where two bones are connected): If you have back pain, chiropractic manipulation may help. Not everyone is a candidate for chiropractic care. See
chiropractor
More examplesFewer examplesI had chiropractic treatment to relieve my neck pain.We dispute the claim that chiropractic adjustments of the spine affect the function of the nervous system.The couple operate two chiropractic clinics.
